Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway/Netherworld Lane Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Lankshire Parkway and Netherworld Lane.
Room.LongDescription: The intersection of Lankshire Parkway and Netherworld Lane marks the northwestern corner of the great Necropolis. The entrance to the Necropolis is located to the east on Netherworld Lane. There is a small memorial facility on the southeastern corner called "Nevermore Funeral Services". The facility has entrances on both Lankshire Parkway and Netherworld Lane.
